info.description:
Maxxton Microservice main class for distributionchannel-service.
 
 Maxxton Group 2015
info.title: distributionchannel-service

post.description:
Create or update an existing stop sell record. This method will take care of existing data and merges that with the incoming data.

 Note: Using a Lowering type with a value of 0 means a delete of the stop sell.

parameters.description: The reseller id for this stop sell
parameters.name: resellerId
stopSell
parameters.description: The ResellerStopSell object to be created

get.description: Get a list of stop sells per reseller

parameters.description: the reseller id of these stop sells
parameters.name: resellerId

default.description: a pageable list of stop sell objects

get.description: Get all Distributionchannels if a filter is provided, only those Distributionchannels matching the filter criteria
Get one stop sell object by reseller and stop sell id
Get the Distributionchannel matching the id

post.description:
Create or update multiple existing stop sell records. This method will take care of existing data and merges that with the incoming data.

 Note: Using a Lowering type with a value of 0 means a delete of the stop sell.

get.description: Get a list of stop sells per resource (id)

stopSellType.description:
Enum for stop sell types:
 0 - Blocking(Block the reservability to 0)
 1 - Lowering(Lower by specific amount)
 2 - Restriction(Restrict to specific amount)

 Maxxton Group 2016
